API.UNAUTHORIZE: Access denied: You do not have the required permissions to view {{tag}} data.
API.NOT_FOUND: Resource not found: The requested item does not exist.
API.RETRIEVAL_ERROR: Data retrieval failed: An unexpected error occurred.
API.CONFLICT: Conflict detected: The request cannot be processed due to the current resource state.
API.FORBIDDEN: Access forbidden: You are not authorized to access this resource.

HOME.HEADLINE: Streamline Your Workflow with TaskFlow
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Effortlessly manage projects and collaborate with your team using TaskFlow. Our intuitive interface and powerful features help you stay organized and productive.

FOOTER.COMPANY_DESCRIPTION: Your company description goes here. Tell visitors about your mission and values.

ORGANIZATION.ORG_PAGE_DESC: View overview of tasks, projects, user and many more.
ORGANIZATION.CHOOSE_AN_OPTION_TO_GET_STARTED: Choose an option to get started with your organization
ORGANIZATION.JOIN_ORGANIZATION_DESCRIPTION: Join an existing organization with an invite code from your team administrator
ORGANIZATION.CREATE_ORGANIZATION_DESCRIPTION: Set up a new organization and invite your team members to collaborate
ORGANIZATION.CHANGE_ORGANIZATION_SETTINGS_LATER: You can always change your organization settings later

ORGANIZATION.SET_UP_A_NEW_ORGANIZATION_FOR_YOUR_TEAM: Set up a new organization for your team

HOME.PLATFORM_DESCRIPTION: Welcome to our platform. Discover what we have to offer.

ABOUT_US.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION: Learn about our company, our mission, vision, and the team behind our platform. Discover our journey and values.

CONTACT_US.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT_US.DESCRIPTION: Get in touch with us for support, feedback, or business inquiries. We're here to help and answer your questions.

SUPPORT.CENTER_DESCRIPTION: Need help? Access our support resources, get answers, and connect with our team for assistance.

ROOT.TITLE: Support Center
ROOT.DESCRIPTION: Access our support center for help with our products, troubleshooting, and customer service resources.

FAQ.TITLE: FAQ
FAQ.DESCRIPTION: Find answers to frequently asked questions about our platform, features, and services.

LEGAL.INFO_DESCRIPTION: Learn about our privacy practices, terms, and how we protect your rights as a user of our platform.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Read about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Your privacy is important to us.

TERMS_CONDITIONS.TITLE: Terms & Conditions
TERMS_CONDITIONS.DESCRIPTION: Review the terms and conditions for using our services, including your rights and responsibilities.

COOKIES_SETTINGS.TITLE: Cookie Settings
COOKIES_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: Manage your cookie preferences and learn how we use cookies to enhance your experience.

USERS.TITLE: User Management
USERS.DESCRIPTION: View and manage users across your application.

USER_DETAIL.TITLE: User: {name}
USER_DETAIL.DESCRIPTION: View and manage user details, sessions, accounts, and security settings.
USER_DETAIL.NAME: Name
USER_DETAIL.UPDATE_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: The user profile has been successfully updated.
USER_DETAIL.RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: A password reset link has been sent to the user's email.
USER_DETAIL.REVOKE_SESSIONS_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: All user sessions have been successfully revoked.

PROFILE_CARD.TITLE: Profile Information
PROFILE_CARD.DESCRIPTION: View and manage user profile details.

PROFILE_COMPLETENESS.TITLE: Profile Completeness
PROFILE_COMPLETENESS.DESCRIPTION: Track the completeness of the user profile.
PROFILE_COMPLETENESS.NAME: Name provided

DANGER_ZONE.TITLE: Danger Zone
DANGER_ZONE.DESCRIPTION: Destructive actions that cannot be undone.
DANGER_ZONE.DELETE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Permanently delete this user account and all associated data.

SESSIONS_CARD.TITLE: Active Sessions
SESSIONS_CARD.DESCRIPTION: View and manage user's active sessions across devices.
SESSIONS_CARD.REVOKE_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: The session has been successfully revoked.

ACCOUNTS_CARD.TITLE: Connected Accounts
ACCOUNTS_CARD.DESCRIPTION: View and manage user's connected authentication providers.

SECURITY_CARD.TITLE: Security Settings
SECURITY_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Manage user security settings and password history.

ACTIVITY_CARD.TITLE: Recent Activity
ACTIVITY_CARD.DESCRIPTION: View recent user activity and login events.

PREFERENCES_CARD.TITLE: User Preferences
PREFERENCES_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Manage user notification and application preferences.
PREFERENCES_CARD.MARKETING_DESCRIPTION: Receive emails about new features and promotions.
PREFERENCES_CARD.SECURITY_DESCRIPTION: Receive emails about security updates and account activity.
PREFERENCES_CARD.UPDATES_DESCRIPTION: Receive emails about product updates and new features.
PREFERENCES_CARD.PREFERENCES_SAVED_DESCRIPTION: Your preferences have been successfully saved.

SESSIONS.TITLE: Session Management
SESSIONS.DESCRIPTION: View and manage user sessions across your application.
SESSIONS.REVOKE_SESSION_DESCRIPTION: This will immediately terminate the user's session and they will need to log in again. This action cannot be undone.
SESSIONS.REVOKE_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: The session has been successfully revoked.

ACCOUNTS.TITLE: Account Management
ACCOUNTS.DESCRIPTION: View and manage user authentication accounts.

PASSWORD_HISTORY.TITLE: Password History
PASSWORD_HISTORY.DESCRIPTION: View password change history for security auditing.

VERIFICATION_TOKENS.TITLE: Verification Tokens
VERIFICATION_TOKENS.DESCRIPTION: Manage email verification and password reset tokens.
VERIFICATION_TOKENS.DELETE_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: The verification token has been successfully deleted.

HEADER_DESCRIPTIONS.ABOUT_US: Learn more about our mission, values, and the team behind TaskFlow.
HEADER_DESCRIPTIONS.CONTACT_US: Reach out to us for support, inquiries, or feedback.
HEADER_DESCRIPTIONS.PRIVACY_POLICY: Read about how we handle your data and protect your privacy.
HEADER_DESCRIPTIONS.TERMS_CONDITIONS: Understand the rules and guidelines for using TaskFlow.
HEADER_DESCRIPTIONS.FAQS: Find answers to frequently asked questions about TaskFlow.
